summary: Implements a PyTorch Lightning workflow for node classification using a GraphSAGE model on the Open Graph Benchmark dataset. It defines a data module to load and batch graph data and a Lightning module that builds the GraphSAGE network, handles forward passes, loss computation, optimizer configuration, and training/validation steps with accuracy metrics and checkpointing.
